Description: This template creates a flex cluster on the MongoDB Atlas API, this will be billed to your Atlas account.

ProjectId.Description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project

ClusterName.Description: Name to use for your Atlas Flex Cluster

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

BackingProviderName.Description: Cloud service provider on which MongoDB Cloud provisioned the flex cluster

RegionName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the region for the flex cluster

TerminationProtectionEnabled.Description: Flag that indicates whether termination protection is enabled on the cluster

FlexClusterId.Description: Unique identifier of the flex cluster

FlexClusterState.Description: Current state of the flex cluster

MongoDBVersion.Description: Version of MongoDB that the flex cluster runs

CreateDate.Description: Date and time when the flex cluster was created

VersionReleaseSystem.Description: Method by which the cluster maintains MongoDB versions

ConnectionStringStandard.Description: Public connection string using mongodb:// protocol

ConnectionStringStandardSrv.Description: Public connection string using mongodb+srv:// protocol

BackupEnabled.Description: Flag indicating whether backups are enabled

DiskSizeGB.Description: Storage capacity of instance data volumes
